mapper.select: SELECT t.order_no FROM tm_order t WHERE t.create_time > #{date} ORDER BY t.order_no DESC limit 1
SELECT count(1) FROM tm_order WHERE STATUS = 1
SELECT count(1) FROM tm_order WHERE STATUS = 1 AND order_status = 'completed'
SELECT count(1) FROM tm_order WHERE STATUS = 0
SELECT sum( unit_price ) FROM tm_order WHERE STATUS = 1
SELECT sum( tp.total_amount ) FROM tm_purchase tp LEFT JOIN tm_order tm ON tp.order_no = tm.order_no WHERE tm.STATUS = 1
SELECT order_status order_status, count(1) orderNum FROM tm_order WHERE establish_date LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT(#{ym}), '%') AND status = 1 GROUP BY order_status
SELECT order_type order_type, count( 1 ) orderNum FROM tm_order WHERE establish_date LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT(#{ym}), '%') AND status = 1 AND order_type IS NOT NULL GROUP BY order_type
